overview:
Roberto Rivera is the Co-Founder and CEO of Ultimate Deal Club Inc. (UDC) a social e-commerce shopping club.

Roberto Rivera has over 20 years experience in the entertainment industry producing events and experiences featuring such Artist as Marc Anthony, Jennifer Lopez, Juan Luis Guerra, Kenneth “BabyFace” Edmunds and Ricky Martin to name a few.
